EmailTemplate.description: Used for case notifications, service issues.
EmailTemplate.name: Notice to All Users: Case issues
EmailTemplate.subject: Salesforce Email Issue Update
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
UPDATE: Issue will be resolved within 2 hours.
We are currently experiencing issues with emails received in Salesforce.
We are working on this issue to resolve as soon as possible and will send an update once resolved.
ASU Salesforce Support Team salesforce.support@asu.edu
